original_text: There were two doors for the side rooms. One door opened towards the north. The other door opened towards the south. They opened into a space that was 2½ metres wide.
korean_text: 그 골방 문은 다 빈 터로 향하였는데 한 문은 북쪽으로 향하였고 한 문은 남쪽으로 향하였으며 그 둘려 있는 빈 터의 너비는 다섯 척이더라

sentences.original_text: There were two doors for the side rooms.
sentences.korean_translation: 측면 방들을 위해 두 개의 문이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: One door opened towards the north.
The other door opened towards the south.
